meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a group of herbivorous dinosaurs with a pelvic structure resembling that of birds.
meanings.sent1: The ornithischian dinosaurs had hips similar to those of birds.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ornithischian features of the dinosaur fossils.
meanings.sent3: The ornithischian dinosaurs waddled around the prehistoric forest, looking like oversized birds.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were graceful and ornithischian, as if she had wings instead of arms.
meanings.sent5: The ornithischian characteristics of the dinosaur made it stand out among its reptilian relatives.

meanings.definition: A member of the group of herbivorous dinosaurs with a pelvic structure resembling that of birds.
meanings.sent1: The ornithischian grazed peacefully in the ancient meadow.
meanings.sent2: Paleontologists discovered a new ornithischian fossil in the desert.
meanings.sent3: The ornithischian was the star of the dinosaur exhibit, charming visitors with its bird-like features.
meanings.sent4: She moved with the agility of an ornithischian, swift and bird-like in her motions.
meanings.sent5: The ornithischian's beak-like mouth was perfect for munching on leaves and plants.
